name: After Squad
description:
After Squad was one of the first games made by version 1.0 of ANGELINA, for a 2011 paper Multi-Faceted Evolution of Simple Arcade Games. You move a grey dot with the arrow keys, and gain points when you touch blue dots. You lose points if you touch the walls - what's the highest score you can get?

For more information on the ANGELINA project, you can visit the project website!
